name: pangolin
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mammal found in Africa and Asia that eats ants or termites, catching them with its long, sticky tongue. It has a long nose, and its body is covered in scales (= hard, flat pieces): The pangolin is also known as a scaly anteater.
